channel.title: Click Object = Autospawn
channel.description: How do I make it so that when somebody clicks on an object, it spawns an Npc? Thanks! ;D

item.title: Click Object = Autospawn
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

Do it like this: case 2182: //firewall if (actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 90; sendMessage("You animate the tz-kih and it starts to follow you!"); server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(2627, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; } break;
2627 is the npc id of tz-kih
Explained: case objectid: //object name/information if (actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = how many seconds need to wait until you can do it again; sendMessage("Text message here"); server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(npcid, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; } break;

Read full topic
